meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Carly Minner Robert Heiler Loyd Gattis Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #3985.

div.div:
Champion's winnings matched to the Families of Freedom Scholarship Fund ($10,000 minimum).
Performances by the L.A. Spirit Chorale featuring Cheryl Farrell.
No "Think!" music played during Final Jeopardy!
(Sarah: I'm in the Voodoo Museum in New Orleans, so next week it should be, "Here's the host of Jeopardy!--Sarah Whitcomb.")

td.p: Carly Minner, a project assistant from Washington, D.C.
Robert Heiler, a director of a public policy think tank from Alexandria, Virginia
Loyd Gattis, a graduate student originally from Norman, Oklahoma (whose 1-day cash winnings total $5,200)

tr.td: THE FIRST MILLENNIUM A.D.
TV TRIVIA
IT'S A BOOK IN THE BIBLE
JUDY, JUDI, JUDIE
DO DO THAT VOODOO
__ OF THE __

')

Robert
Carly

FOR WHOM THE BELL TOLLS
THE SNOWS OF KILIMANJARO
A MOVEABLE FEAST
A FAREWELL
TO "ARM"S

div.h3: Scores at the end of the Double Jeopardy! Round:

tr.td: Loyd
Robert
Carly

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex: [To Carly] You were probably going for "What is Latin?" That would\'ve been incorrect.)
...
(Alex: [To Robert] And we take and match that amount for the families of Freedom Scholarship Fund. And that means that that scholarship fund this week on Jeopardy! will have earned about $87,000, with our best wishes. Have a good weekend, ladies and gentlemen. Happy holidays. We\'ll see you Monday.)
CarlyWhat is La
$2,000
LoydWhat is German?
$9,400
RobertWhat is German
$13,100
German')
div.onmouseout:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', 'The song you\'re hearing right now was written originally in this language:

"...Tender and mild /
Sleep in heavenly peace /
Sleep in heavenly peace..."')

tr.td: CHRISTMAS SONGS

The song you're hearing right now was written originally in this language:
"...Tender and mild /
Sleep in heavenly peace /
Sleep in heavenly peace..."
Loyd
Robert
Carly
2nd place: trip to Vancouver & stay at Hakai Beach Resort
New champion: $30,900
3rd place: trip to New Hampshire's Attitash Bear Peak & stay at Grand Summit
Loyd
Robert
Carly

(including 1 DD),

(including 1 DD)

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
